short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use to track shows you're watching!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A plugin which allows you to track which shows/animes/kdramas you're watching and save them for later! Simply press the "Store" button and the link is saved across all your synced chrome browsers!

WARNING: This project is still in alpha; it is still under regular development. Please contact me with feature requests!
